attributes.additional_details: The House of Lords is an unelected body which interferes with the elected Government's agenda and causes unnecessary delay in the creation of laws - we do not need a second elected chamber to cause stalemate as elsewhere.
attributes.background: To close down the House of Lords - it has no part in a democracy.
